Diana: "Diana is being falsely accused by Bob who has no proof. Bob is trying to mislead us and push suspicion onto me without evidence."

You: "Diana, as the detective, my investigation clearly shows you're the mafioso. Your denials won't save you—vote her out now!"

Diana was arrested
